channel.title: Android on Sam Machin
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Sam Machin

item.title: Android, Buyer Currency Support C-
item.description: One of the new features announced by Google yesterday was support for “Buyer Currency” now this may come as something of a shock to iPhone users but chargeable apps in the Android Market have been billed in the developers currency since launch!

item.title: T-Mobile G1 vs. iPhone - Round One to iPhone
item.description: So the G1 is out, I’ve had a chance to play with one in a T-Mobile store and it seems like a nice OS, however it doesn’t look like an iPhone killer yet.
